title: Citable tokens

## Overview

Choose a passage and list orthographic tokens of the Hebrew Bible and Vulgate texts in adjacent columns, with identifying passage element from the token's URN.


:::{.callout-tip}
This notebook is especially handy for editing the correspondences of the Complutensian's glossing indexing connecting the Vulgate and the Hebrew Bible.
:::

## Notebook

- [HTML version](./citabletokens.html) (readable in a web browser)
- [Pluto notebook](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/neelsmith/complutensian-texts/refs/heads/main/pluto/reading/citabletokens.jl) (download and open in Pluto)
